column4: This House would abolish national days
This House regrets the existence of Valentine's Day
This House would rename Christmas with a name that is religiously neutral
This House would not buy Apple
This House would end all research and development tax credits for highly profitable technology companies
This House regrets the rise of computer science at the expense of the humanities
This House would favour creativity over intelligence
This House believes that field hockey is better than ice hockey
This House would rather play with Lego than Barbie
This House would stop importing bananas from Latin America
This House believes that tomatoes are a fruit
This House would require all fruit to carry labels noting what pesticides are used on them
This House would make an exception to laws forbidding indecent exposure for days with hot temperatures
This House regrets the development of different fashion lines for men and women"
This House believes that it is unprofessional to wear flip-flops (jandals, thongs) to work
This House would stop using cash
This House would allow private organisations to compete in providing currency
